name: Brush On Nail Glue
about: What it is:An easy-to-apply brush-on nail glue that helps you create the most seamless at-home mani in minutes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Getting salon-style nails from home has never been easier. The Brush-On Nail Glue takes the mess out of at-home nail application, allowing you to have a cute, fresh set in minutes. Its transportable size allows you to touch up your nails on the go to ensure your nail game is always 100% on point.
ingredients: Ethyl Cyanoacrylate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, BHA, Red 7 (CI 15850).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Clean nails thoroughly..-Brush a thin layer of glue onto your natural nails with the Glamnetic Brush-On Nail Glue applicator..-Apply a layer of glue onto the Glamnetic Press-On Nails..-Place press-on nails onto natural nails. Press together for 10 seconds to ensure strong hold.
